remarks: The predicate "is an atom".  ( ~ elatcv0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jun-2012.)
statement:
isatom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isatom.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
isatom.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
isatom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
isat2 $p |- ( ( K e. D /\ P e. B ) -> ( P e. A <-> .0. C P ) ) $.
